attributes.action: Allow Li Fang to stay in the United Kingdom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Li fang married my brother ilegally and she is to be deported back to China. She has two small children a boy and a girl.

If deported back she will have to lose one of her children because of the law to allow only one child out in China.

Please help grant this woman the right to remain in the United Kingdom for her protection and both of her children's.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
